describe: Moldova, officially known as the Republic of Moldova, is a landlocked country in Eastern Europe, bordered by Romania to the west and Ukraine to the north, east, and south. Known for its rich cultural heritage, Moldova boasts a diverse landscape of rolling hills, vineyards, and historic sites.

cities.geographical_location: Situated on the eastern bank of the Dniester River, Tiraspol is the capital of the unrecognized Transnistria region.
